billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

title: Expands the definition of "tenant" for purposes of notice upon the commencement of an action to foreclose upon the leased residential real property
summary: Expands the definition of "tenant" for purposes of notice upon the commencement of an action to foreclose upon the leased residential real property.
lawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to notice to tenants upon foreclosure of the leased residential real property
